docs.lead_paragraph: The N.H.L. will throw "the world's greatest arena rock band" Def Leopard at their fans in "an opening day spectacular." They're calling this "NHL Face-Off Rocks™ 2008" (don't forget the "™"), a nice clunky title. Whatever happened to "Game On"? -- not that we miss it.

docs.lead_paragraph: GREEN BAY, Wis. - Senator John McCain gave a few new details of his economic proposals at a speech here Friday morning, but the address seemed as much a political shot at Senator Barack Obama as a policy prescription.

headline.main: McCain Fires at Obama Over Economy

docs.abstract: While John McCain used the spotlight to talk about reforms, the speech was as much about politics as it was about economics.
